TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description: The Twitter consume key to update the bouzuya's status

TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: The Twitter consume secret to update the bouzuya's status

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The Twitter access token to update the bouzuya's status

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: The Twitter access token secret to update the bouzuya's status

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: The bucket name to save data

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The access key id to save data

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The secret access token to save data
